snippet: Here are some essential items to ease the rough and tumble of skateboarding for members of Generation X and older.
abstract: Roundup of several essential items for older skateboarders that will ease the rough and tumble of the sport.
lead_paragraph: Here are some essential items to ease the rough and tumble of skateboarding for members of Generation X and older.
